Typedef Documentation

typedef void(Event::Handler::* Gwen::Dialogs::FileSaveSuccessCallback)(const String &filename)

Callback function, for successful file save.

Function Documentation

template<typename A >
void Gwen::Dialogs::FileOpen ( bool  bUseSystem,
const String &  Name,
const String &  StartPath,
const String &  Extension,
Gwen::Event::Handler *  pHandler = NULL,
A  fnCallback = NULL 
)

Create a file open dialog box.

Parameters
bUseSystem: If true dialog may use the system's modal dialog - which will steal focus and pause the rest of GWEN until it's continued.

Usage:

Gwen::Dialogs::FileOpen( true, "Open Map", "C:/my/folder/", "My Map Format|*.bmf",
this, &MyClass::OpenFilename );
Note
Templated function simply to avoid having to manually cast the callback function.
void Gwen::Dialogs::FileOpenEx ( bool  bUseSystem,
const String &  Name,
const String &  StartPath,
const String &  Extension,
Gwen::Event::Handler *  pHandler = NULL,
Gwen::Event::Handler::FunctionWithInformation  fnCallback = NULL 
)

const String &  Name,
const String &  StartPath,
const String &  Extension,
Gwen::Event::Handler *  pHandler = NULL,
A  fnCallback = NULL 
)

Open a dialog to save a file.

Parameters
bUseSystem: If true dialog may use the system's modal dialog - which will steal focus and pause the rest of GWEN until it's continued.

Usage:

Gwen::Dialogs::FileSave( true, "Save Map", "C:/my/folder/", "My Map Format|*.bmf",
this, &MyClass::OpenFilename );
Note
Templated function simply to avoid having to manually cast the callback function.

const String &  Name,
const String &  StartPath,
const String &  Extension,
Gwen::Event::Handler *  pHandler = NULL,
Gwen::Event::Handler::FunctionWithInformation  fnCallback = NULL 
)
template<typename A >
void Gwen::Dialogs::FolderOpen ( bool  bUseSystem,
const String &  Name,
const String &  StartPath,
Gwen::Event::Handler *  pHandler = NULL,
A  fnCallback = NULL 
)

Open a dialog to choose a folder.

Parameters
bUseSystem: If true dialog may use the system's modal dialog - which will steal focus and pause the rest of GWEN until it's continued. Usage:
Gwen::Dialogs::FolderOpen( true, "Open Map folder", "C:/my/folder/",
"My Map Format|*.bmf", this, &MyClass::OpenFilename );
Note
Templated function simply to avoid having to manually cast the callback function.

const String &  Name,
const String &  StartPath,
Gwen::Event::Handler *  pHandler = NULL,
Gwen::Event::Handler::FunctionWithInformation  fnCallback = NULL
